text: Mario Cristián Osmín Briceño Portilla (born 20 June 1996 in La Serena, Chile) is a Chilean footballer who plays as a winger for Ñublense on loan from Universidad de Chile. ==External links== * * Profile at Universidad de Chile Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Primera B de Chile players Category:Deportes La Serena footballers Category:Universidad de Chile footballers Category:C.D. title: Mario Briceño
